condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 31 December 2015, children are protected by and have access to a functional justice system applying procedures that are sensitive to age and gender, with a focus on the Sahel, North and East regions

description.narrative: UNICEF-Burkina Faso technically and financially supported the Government to provide alternative measure to detention to 326 minors in conflict with the law (MCL), including 23 girls. To accelerate the universal birth registration, the CO contributed to the establishment of 12 regional CRVS plans, along with regional steering committees led by the governors. These plans incorporate strategic elements such as the coordination of multi-sectoral actors, operationalization of the interoperable CRVS services across sectors with focus on expansion of secondary civil registration centers in health facilities, allocation of increased national budget at subnational level, and monitoring of plans by the steering committees. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:30/03/2018
